statements: DELETE FROM Merchants WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Merchants WHERE merchant_id = 101 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Merchants WHERE state = 'California' AND zip_code = '90210';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1001 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM merchants WHERE merchant_type = 'Restaurant' AND merchant_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_price > 100.00 AND merchant_id IN (SELECT merchant_id FROM merchants WHERE merchant_name = 'ABC Corp');
DELETE FROM order_item WHERE order_id = 10 AND product_id = 3;
